entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] System.Security.Tests failing on macOS with link errors #76498
  • AV under coreclr!GlobalStringLiteralMap::AddStringLiteral #76494
    8.0.0
  • In Xamarin Forms, NetInterface.NetworkInterfaceType always return a value of 0 on Android. #76493
  • Intermittent build failure in AfterSourceBuild: "Could not write state file" #76488
  • Update src/tests infra to use `DOTNET_`-prefixed environment variables #76484
    Future
  • Consider removing security object info from GCInfo #76482
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #76478
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Lazy api #76403
  • `xunit.extensibility.execution 2.4.2-pre.22` - ` primary signature's signing certificate is not trusted by the trust provider.` #73646
    8.0.0
  • Reference to static data with ROSpan not kept in register #12241
    Future
  • Operations on halfs of a Vector256 #76066
    8.0.0
  • Linguistic apostrophe does not work with DateOnly.TryParseExact #76413
    Future
  • Allow model-binding error messages to be customised #41408
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Attempt to fix native AOT with CryptoKit #76499
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #76497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert change in AddInternedString #76496
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LinuxBionic] Disable RemoteExecutor during test runs #76495
  • Lower `GetLower` nodes formed from `GetElement(0)` #76492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not transform SIMD field access into HWIs in minopts #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security
  • Re-enable DynamicGenerics test on OSX #76489
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete security object from GCInfo encoder/decoder #76487
    area-VM-coreclr
  • block port# 5060 and 5061 #76485
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make CodeSnippets tests more pluggable #76479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Introduce a WASM JIT for interpreter opcodes #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [interpreter] Treat methods with the Intrinsic attribute as if they have AggressiveInlining set #76475
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, MonoInterpreter=true
  • Don't cache the Compilation object in steps in the interop source generators #76474
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

Merged

  • Reinstate strict prototypes warning #76463
    community-contribution
  • Fix SuperPMI unit test error checking #76411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fix potential division by zero in fgopt.cpp #76424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement ChaCha20Poly1305 with CryptoKit on macOS #76317
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • JIT: allow forward sub of QMARK nodes #76476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update jitrollingbuild.py #76472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve early bail-out logic in GCInfoDecoder #76359
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid internal register allocation when possible for PUTARG_SPLIT #76443
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DEBUG/non-DEBUG SuperPMI asm diffs #76470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove `IDispatchImplAttribute` API #76416
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Use System.CommandLine (v2) in dotnet-pgo #76467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Split runtime-extra-platforms into distinct pipelines #76328
  • Remove .dll from Interop.Libraries.HostPolicy for consistency with other runtime libraries #76466
    area-Host
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • System.Private.Xml AOT compatibility fixes #76473
    area-System.Xml, linkable-framework
  • JIT: A small CQ improvement for Equals/StartsWith unrolling #76439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Cleaner way of specifying environment variables for tests #76458
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] EmccExtraExportedRuntimeMethods MSBuild property #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76471
    area-Meta
